briefDescription: Aggregate denoting the version of a program as a number.
detailedDescription: Aggregate denoting the version of a program as a number.

items.briefDescription: The major part of the version's number.
detailedDescription:
The major part of the version's number.
Usually increases when major, possibly breaking changes to behaviour are done.
items.name: major

items.briefDescription: The minor part of the version's number.
detailedDescription:
The minor part of the version's number.
Usually increases when minor, non-breaking changes to behaviour are done.
items.name: minor

items.briefDescription: The smallest part of the version's number.
detailedDescription:
The smallest part of the version's number.
Usually increases when bugs in behaviour is fixed.
items.name: patch

name: program_version
